alert.note: Alert for Logan; Morgan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 6:39PM MDT until July 21 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Northeastern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... Southwestern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 639 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stoneham, or 22 miles north of Fort Morgan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Willard, Pawnee Pass and Logan Corners. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
